accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

accountTerritoryID.title: Account Territory Id
accountTerritoryID.description: The territory to which the account has been assigned.

accountPhysicalAddress.title: Account Physical Address
accountPhysicalAddress.description: Actual physical address of the account. Could be the HQ address or any preffered business address for communication.

accountParentID.title: Parent Account
accountParentID.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent account must be an existing account in salesforce. You can enter the account name, or select (or optionally, create) the account using the lookup icon.

partnerAccountID.title: Partner Account Id
partnerAccountID.description: Partner accounts are accounts that a channel manager uses to manage partner organizations, partner users, and activities when using a partner community or partner portal.

accountNumber.title: Account Number
accountNumber.description: Tracking or reference number for account. Up to 40 characters are allowed in this field.

accountSite.title: Account Site Details
accountSite.description: Information about the accountâ€™s location, such as single location, headquarters, or branch. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

accountOwnership.title: Ownership
accountOwnership.description: Ownership of company, for example, public or private. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

accountTradeStyle.title: Account Trade Style
accountTradeStyle.description: A name, different from its legal name, that an organization may use for conducting business. Similar to (Doing business as) or (DBA).
